name: OMGWASPS
description:
A sunny and pleasant summer's day out in Ireland, rare enough though it might be, is the perfect day for a picnic. But no sooner has the food come out of the hamper, than a swarm of hungry wasps appears on the horizon.

Defeat the wasps who seek to ruin your day, and enjoy your picnic as a victorious and mighty hero!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZJbXajq0EgA

Controller support.

Playing with HIGH resolution recommended.
